title: Environmental effects of Atlantic slave trade

content.prompt: All of the following were significant environmental effects of the trade illustrated on the map EXCEPT

choices.label: the spread of Afro-Eurasian diseases in the Americas
soil depletion and erosion from intensive agriculture in the Caribbean
American foods becoming staple crops in Africa
air pollution resulting from the increased exploitation of fossil fuels

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
